```{r, echo=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("~/git/multi-agent-neural-network/output/network_of_agents.pout", header=FALSE)

df2 <- df %>%
  group_by(V1) %>%
  summarize(total1 = sum(V3))
```

# Total 1's for each time tick

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(df2, aes(x=V1, y = total1)) + geom_line()
```
